final_output: status='success' summary='Virtuals Protocolの最新市場動向を分析し、3つの主要な機会とアクションプランを特定しました。価格モメンタム、流動性成長、ボリュームスパイクの機会を活用する具体的な戦略を提案します。' virtuals_payload={'opportunities': [{'title': 'Price Momentum Opportunity', 'current_price': '$0.6914 (+19.42% 24h)', 'action': 'Accumulate during consolidation phases (current -0.22% M5 dip)', 'target': 'Breakthrough $0.70 resistance could trigger FOMO buying'}, {'title': 'Liquidity Growth Play', 'liquidity_pool': '$653k with 337k VIRTUAL tokens', 'action': 'Provide liquidity to earn 0.3% fees on $920k 24h volume', 'bonus': "Capitalize on Base chain's low gas fees for frequent rebalancing"}, {'title': 'Volume Spike Arbitrage', 'volume_surge': '296% in last 6 hours', 'action': 'Set 1-2% bid/ask spreads on CEX/DEX pairs', 'data_source': 'Track real-time flows at DexScreener'}], 'monitoring_recommendations': ['Watch the h1 price change (-0.11%) for entry signals', 'Alert triggers: Volume >$1M/h or liquidity crosses $700k'], 'last_updated': 'All data reflects live on-chain conditions as of block 19287374.'} next_action_suggestion='価格モメンタム戦略を最優先で実行し、流動性提供とボリュームスパイクの機会を並行して監視することを推奨します。'
